commit.message:
re PR middle-end/48270 (New test failures)

2011-03-24  Richard Guenther  <rguenther@suse.de>

	PR tree-optimization/48270
	* tree-ssa-phiopt.c (cond_if_else_store_replacement): Do
	not free datarefs before ddrs.

From-SVN: r171394

files.patch:
